articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Rupee edges higher by 4 paise against US dollar; Sensex, Nifty retract in early trade
articles.description: The BSE benchmark Sensex drifted lower by nearly 166 points and the NSE Nifty slipped below the 11,500-level in the opening session Friday due to intense selling mainly in banking, power and healthcare shares amid weak Asian cues.
articles.content: By: PTI | Mumbai | Published: September 7, 2018 11:04:20 am The rupee Thursday plunged to new record low of 72.11 a dollar in intra-day trade before closing at 71.99, showing a steep 24 paise fall. The rupee Friday opened on a positive note and was trading ma… [+1996 chars]

articles.author: ENS Economic Bureau
articles.title: Rupee nears 72 level on panic rush among investors for dollars
articles.description: Dealers said the central bank sold $24 billion during the span when the rupee fell from 65 to the dollar to 69 while it has sold just about $5 billion when it moved from 70 to 72.
articles.content: The RBI then intervened in a mild way and the rupee recouped partially and closed at 71.99 against the dollar. (Representational Image) The rupee on Thursday fell below the 72 mark in intra-day trading for the first time and closed 23 paise down at 71.99 agai… [+3098 chars]

articles.title: Sun Pharma falls 5% on report of co getting 6 observations by US FDA for Halol unit
articles.description: The observations include aspects such as lack of appropriate test measures for lab controls along with some procedural issues too.

articles.title: Competition Commission approves Linde-Praxair deal
articles.description: "CCI India approves combination of Linde and Praxair, subject to compliance of certain modifications," the regulator said in a tweet Friday.
